response.overview: Pulling back the veil on the global Targeted Individual program—a sophisticated military-grade torture campaign of stalking and harassment with cutting-edge neuroweapons. Its tactics are akin to MKUltra & COINTELPRO and it's still in operation today, driving ordinary, innocent civilians to homelessness, suicide and maybe even murder.  Hear heartfelt testimonies from victims of 'government weaponization' and discover its devastating impact on their lives.  It’s not paranoia—it’s a cruel reality, and it could even be influencing you without your knowledge.
response.title: Cognitive Liberty: Mind Control
